responses.body: {  "id": "{{ faker 'random.uuid' }}",  "name": "Queendom (Girls ver.)",  "collection": {    "id": "{{ faker 'random.uuid' }}",    "title": "Red Velvet",    "cover_image": "/img/collection/cover/red_velvet.png",    "thumbnail": "/img/collection/thumbnail/red_velvet.png",    "description": "{{ faker 'commerce.productDescription' }}",    "item_count": {{ faker 'random.number' 100 }},    "collected_count": 0  },  "collected": {{ faker 'random.boolean' }},  "image": "/img/item/queendom_girls_ver.png",  "description": "Queendom is the sixth Korean extended play and twelfth overall by South Korean girl group Red Velvet. Marketed as the group's sixth \"mini album\" release, it consists of six tracks, including the lead single of the same name.",  "release_date": "2021-08-17T16:45:38.827Z"}
